channel.title: [Rs2][500k][$5] Pmh1000's Auto Fletcher, Current Version: 4.0 Beta!
channel.description:
I have spent Months working on this update. i have been trying to make sure everything was just right and i kept coming up for new thigns to add. so i am sorry it took so long to release its just i keep finding new things to do and i wanted it to be tested well. Thats why its in the beta stage currently but everything is operational. It's Just that i want to make it available to be tested so i can see if anyone else has any ideas/suggestions/bugs so i can make it even better. The Script Now has over [size=20pt][color=red]2700[/size] lines of code, 2733 to be exact. well anyway i hope everyone that purchases this script can benefit from it.
[size=14pt]This Script Can Cut Roughly About 1100 To 1200 Logs An Hour![/size]
HUGE UPDATE. Ive finished with Version 4.0 Beta Here Is A List Of The Changes: Version 4.0 This was a MAJOR update and thus we jumped ahead to V4.0 Anyway there are many changes and instead of explaining them all ill just list them: 1) Added SRLPlayerForm in place of setupplayers 2) Did a Check Version with http Website. 3) Added Efficency with targeted xper hour verses real x per hour, do some tests and log all the numbers in an hour or targeted xper hour, find avergae and use that ad the targeted xper hour amount 4) Target Efficiency is 1000 per hour 5) Added BackGround Picture And Remodled Form 6) Fixed The Error With xPerHour 7) Adjusted The Window Satae Procedure to Make It Start Better 8) Fixed A Lot Of Scripting Bugs due to Srl 4.0 9) Add Srl Randoms Report 10) Removed Check If Lvled 11) Remodle AntiRandoms 12) Add Script To Srl Stats Database 13) Added A Procedure To Check For A knife 14) Added Option For Random Numbers With Make X 15) Implement Srl Stats To the Script 16) Add Srl Id/ Password 17) Remove MakeShift Procedures 18) ReMade FindBankBooth 19) Fix Banking Procedures In Script And In Form 20) Create Terms And Conditions In Place Of Disguise 21) Removed A Few Out Of Date/Useless Procedure and functions 22) Adjusted The Running Procedure
[size=14pt]Email Me Or Pm Me For The Update / To Test The Beta Version Of 4.0[/size]
Report: [Color=green] Pmh1000's Report
Pmh1000's Auto_Fletcher V 2.4 ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ Currently: Finished Fletching Successfully Worked for 28 Minutes and 30 Seconds Fletched 513 Logs Fletched The 500 Logs You Wanted Plus 13 Extra!
Wtf I Spank's Report
Pmh1000's Auto_Fletcher V 3.1 ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ Currently: Finding BankBooth Worked for 2 Hours, 18 Minutes and 1 Seconds Fletched 2188 Yew Bows Only 7801 Yew Logs Left Strung 0 Yew Bows Only 11372 Yew Bows left Bank Procedure: FindBankBooth
Macro2much's leet Report
Pmh1000's Auto_Fletcher V 2.5 ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ Currently: Finding BankBooth Worked for 5 Hours, 49 Minutes and 22 Seconds Fletched 5401 Willow Bows Only 10842 Willow Logs Left
BeerBelly911's Report
Pmh1000's Auto_Fletcher V 2.4 ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ Currently: Finding BankBooth Worked for 1 Hours, 4 Minutes and 13 Seconds Fletched 1107 Willow Bows
Wtf i spank's Report
Pmh1000's Auto_Fletcher V 3.0 ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ Currently: Finding BankBooth Worked for 1 Hours, 0 Minutes and 35 Seconds Strung 546 Yew Bows Only 376 Yew Bows left Bank Procedure: FindBankBooth [/Color] Picture Of The Form:
[Img]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/7250/fletcherformbu2.png[/img]
[Size=18pt][font=Chiller]Currently [size=36pt][color=blue]54[/color][/size] People Have Purchased This Script[/font][/Size]
UPDATE LIST: Current Version : [Size=24pt][font=Chiller][color=red]4.0 Beta[/color][/font][/size] Version 4.0 This was a MAJOR update and thus we jumped ahead to V4.0 Anyway there are many changes and instead of explaining them all ill just list them: 1) Added SRLPlayerForm in place of setupplayers 2) Did a Check Version with http Website. 3) Added Efficency with targeted xper hour verses real x per hour, do some tests and log all the numbers in an hour or targeted xper hour, find avergae and use that ad the targeted xper hour amount 4) Target Efficiency is 1000 per hour 5) Added BackGround Picture And Remodled Form 6) Fixed The Error With xPerHour 7) Adjusted The Window Satae Procedure to Make It Start Better 8) Fixed A Lot Of Scripting Bugs due to Srl 4.0 9) Add Srl Randoms Report 10) Removed Check If Lvled 11) Remodle AntiRandoms 12) Add Script To Srl Stats Database 13) Added A Procedure To Check For A knife 14) Added Option For Random Numbers With Make X 15) Implement Srl Stats To the Script 16) Add Srl Id/ Password 17) Remove MakeShift Procedures 18) ReMade FindBankBooth 19) Fix Banking Procedures In Script And In Form 20) Create Terms And Conditions In Place Of Disguise 21) Removed A Few Out Of Date/Useless Procedure and functions 22) Adjusted The Running Procedure Version 3.3 For This Update i had to fix a few var errors caused by the new srl, 3.81 this is now fixed and thus the script will compile again. i also had to redo the stringing procedure because rs FINALLY decided to put in a make-x into stringing, everyone knows that alot of peeps fletch and have needed it for a long time. well anywayz i fixed the stringing procedure and made a few changes to some other things in order to make the script run a little smoother. i hope everyone enjoys to update! Version 3.2 Basically I have made a lot of chanegs based on the New srl (3.7) And the new scar, Scar Divi 3.06, Everything is now fully functional and i have made several bug fixes and modified a few procedures as well as speeding up the fletching and stringing some. thanks for everyones patience, i have been so busy and im sorry it took me so long to release it :\ but its here now! 3.2 Version 3.1 Improved the stringing by making it faster and run smoother. Improved the Bank Detection by correcting a timing error for the procedure bankerror; thus enabling the fail safe with the setting in the form Made the banking open smoother. Improved the timing on the wait during fletching by tweaking my technique. This allows for better detection on laggy comps as well. Added compass direction for logging in and when script takes a break. Corrected a bug with locating the bank, a fail safe Added a detection to my GoToScreen procedure, where it clicks on rs screen if form didnt minimize, now will detect if it needs to do this. Version 3.0 This was a huge update that added DetectFrogCave, a new banking procedure that i wrote, OneClickBank. I also removed some procedures due to them no longer being used, CloseBank2 LoginPlayer2 & LogOutEvery2. I reorginized all of the procedure into five categories, Misc Bank Fletching Stringing & Forms. Made a list of every procedure that i wrote in my script and i gave the line number where they were found. It is still left as OpenSource so that you can learn from my script Version 2.5 Made A few Changes With SRL V3.4 And Fixed The Banking Errors :P Version 2.4 Added A BankType Which Allows You To Pick Between 5 Different Banking Procedures, As Well As OpenBankQuiet And The Area Your At :) Version 2.3 Added A LogType To The Form And Now You Can Even Cut Shafts And Reg Bows :) Version 2.2 Changed The Script To Accommidate The CrossBow Stock Option Version 2.1 Added Forms To The Script :P Thanxs To Starblaster, MadCow & Bego Version 2.0 Changed The Whole Script Using New Techniques To Make The Script Much Better Then What It Once Was Including Antiban, Randoms And Using SRL Version 1.5 Rewrote My Randoms Procedure As Well As The Banking And Antiban Features Version 1.4 Scripted It With The New Squig2 And Added A Few More Antiban Features Version 1.3 Added The Ability To Choose Whether You Fletch Or Whether You String. Version 1.2 Added The Ability To Also String Bows After Your Done Fletching Version 1.1 Put In A Working Progress Report For Both Fletching And Stringing
[size=18pt]NEWS: 4.0 Beta Has Now Been Released And It Is Back Up For Sale!
[b]MSN - Pmh1000@hotmail.com E-Mail - Pmh1000@hotmail.com[/b]

item.title: [Rs2][500k][$5] Pmh1000's Auto Fletcher, Current Version: 4.0 Beta!
item.dc:creator: @simen236 simen236
item.description:
@simen236 wrote:

If you want anyone to read this, post it at SRL forums.

[quote=“Pmh1000, post:195, topic:7269”]wow guys i haven’t been on in a long time. i have been so busy with rl i havent even touched rs or scar. im sorry if i offended anyone by my sudden disappearance. I had a lot going on and things have calmed down some now. Since i haven’t touched rs i have two issues that I’m currently debating.

  1. i no longer have a rs member account and as such cant update the script without one.

  2. Should i even bother updating it? How many people really use it now.

  3. Is there even a way to sell it for rs2 cash any more.

So guys Its up to you, Post your thoughts here and based on the replies ill decide whether or not to blow the dust off of this classic kick ass script and revamp it

Thanks in advance for your input, Support, Patience And Kindness

Pmh[/quote]

Read full topic

Thanks in advance for your input, Support, Patience And Kindness

item.title: [Rs2][500k][$5] Pmh1000's Auto Fletcher, Current Version: 4.0 Beta!
item.dc:creator: @Pmh1000 Pmh1000
item.description:
@Pmh1000 wrote:

just to give everyone an update. i have been 95% done with v4.0 twice now and due to a hard drive crash the first time i lost all 18 hours worth of work. i was pissed but yesterday i decided to sit down and do it all ove again from the start of version 3.3. However, somehow i got a trojan that was giving my popups from hell and not allowing me to go to any websites. i fought it for about 30 min and uploaded the only copy of 4.0 that i had. i attached it and emailed it to my self. i was happy that i was able to save it before i wiped the hard drive and started over again.thats been the second wipe in a week. anyhow after the wipe i went to pull it from my email and finish it. i had put around 8 hours of nonstop work into it this time. and when i downloaded it, it was like i had done nothing… somehow it was reverted back to 3.3 so naturally im pissed as hell and i swear im going to try one more time and if something happens im going to take a two-three week break because ive put alot into it two time and lost it both time. 26 hours of straight work with a lot of improvements and making it a lot better was lost. so anyways im going to start on it now and if all goes well ill have it soon. thanks for your patience and understanding. your support is the reason that i am still working on it. without it i would have given up already. and to all that want to purchase it i just want to let you know that first i want to have 4.0 released because due to a updated srl / rs interface 3.3 doesnt currently work. I hope you understand. i just dont want to sell you a broken copy, even though the new one should be out soon.

P.S. Please remember to email me with suggestions and ideas on what i could do to make the script even better, or if you find a bug. send the email to, pmh1000@hotmail.com and for the subject either put ‘Fletcher V(Version number) Bug’ Or ‘Suggestion For Fletcher’

Thanks So Much

Pmh[br][size=1]Posted on: October 22, 2007, 07:40:25 AM[/size][hr]just to give everyone an update i have finished coding 4.0 its not in the alpha testing phase and it is performing great. soon i will be moving on the beta testing then i will release it. it will arrive before you know it.

Pmh

Read full topic
item.source: [Rs2][500k][$5] Pmh1000's Auto Fletcher, Current Version: 4.0 Beta!

item.title: [Rs2][500k][$5] Pmh1000's Auto Fletcher, Current Version: 4.0 Beta!
item.dc:creator: @script_owned4 script_owned4
item.description:
@script_owned4 wrote:

[quote=“Pmh1000, post:178, topic:7269”]I’ve been working my ass off and i hope to have it out soon with the new srl and everything. i hope that i can fix the bug that i ran into while i was scripting it so hopefully i can fix it soon and i will be able to have this update out soon. thanks so much for you patience and i do appreciate all suggestions and if i like them i will incorporate them into the script. if i do use your suggestion then i will post your name on my main page and in my script thanking you for your contribution. so don’t be afraid to suggest anything even if it may seem stupid to you. it could be a good idea or may spawn into a good idea. and once i post that i have released the update all that want to buy it please email me with your rs name and what method you would like to use when buying if you don’t mind. thanks so much for all of the support, patience and prayers. it really means a lot to me.

~Pmh~~[/quote]
You are back I was wondering that you would never be back!

Read full topic
